title: Strengthening Nursing Practical Competencies: Case-Based Online Design for Self-Directed Language Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can analyze real-world language usage scenarios to develop self-directed learning plans.
Learners can submit project outcomes that solve language-related problem situations provided online.
Learners can redesign language usage scenarios based on peer feedback.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
